Articles.Content: I am currently in version 1.11.1 in ksp using some mods one of them and the procedural parts, but every time I enter a sandbox save the procedural parts are limited to 1.6 meters. Does anyone know anything?
Welcome to the forum @ArturLeda, your issue has been moved from KSP discussion as this seems more like a support issue.

This is a sandbox issue exclusively,
While in science and career, you unlock the tech nodes to expand on procedural parts, but in sandbox, those nodes don't exist so simply it uses the base "limited" one.
Two fixes.
GO into the game settings before you start the sandbox save and change them to "have all part upgrades in sandbox mode)
Another way around it is to start a newscience save, use the alt F12 menu to get all the science you need to unlock the tec-tree and simply use that as a sandbox save.
Hope it helps

@ArturLeda
